shop.services package

Submodules

shop.services.workers module

shop.services.workers.accept_complaint_service(complaint, worker, compensation_str, is_refund)[source]

Process complaint acceptance with compensation.

Args:

complaint (Complaint): Complaint object to resolve worker (Worker): Support worker handling complaint compensation_str (str): String representation of compensation amount is_refund (bool): Whether to issue full order refund

shop.services.workers.add_client_compensation(client_id, compensation_str)[source]

Add compensation to client’s balance.

Args:

client_id (int): ID of client compensation_str (str): String representation of amount

Returns:

tuple: (success: bool, error: str|None)

shop.services.workers.add_courier_compensation(courier_id, compensation_str)[source]

Add compensation to courier’s latest incident.

Args:

courier_id (int): ID of courier worker compensation_str (str): String representation of amount

Returns:

tuple: (success: bool, error: str|None)

shop.services.workers.create_incident(delivery, support_worker)[source]

Create new delivery incident record.

Args:

delivery (Delivery): Delivery object to associate support_worker (Worker): Worker creating incident

shop.services.workers.decline_complaint_service(complaint, worker, resolution_text)[source]

Update complaint with decline resolution.

Args:

complaint (Complaint): Complaint object to update worker (Worker): Support worker resolving complaint resolution_text (str): Explanation of decline reason

shop.services.workers.recreate_order_and_delivery(old_delivery_id, planned_time_str, same_deliverer, deliverer_id, client_id, products_data)[source]

Recreate order and delivery with new parameters.

Args:

old_delivery_id (int): Original delivery ID to reference planned_time_str (str): ISO format datetime string for new delivery same_deliverer (bool): Keep original courier deliverer_id (int): New courier ID if changing client_id (int): Client ID for new order products_data (dict): {product_id: quantity} mapping

Returns:

Delivery: Newly created delivery object

Raises:

ValidationError: If any data validation fails
